about_the_game:
Aren't you tired of constantly meddling in already ongoing conflicts only from the sidelines? Or provoke them, but even here you have no opportunity to intervene directly and introduce troops, putting an end to your enemies once and for all? Or maybe you just want a "good old-fashioned expansion of living space"? Well, this is your time:

- directly impose the regimes you want among your neighbours or bring your friends there
- expand not just your zone of influence, but your territorial borders across Southeast Asia
- create the biggest country - the East Asian Federation
- show the Soviet Union the full power of the Chinese army and even restore Chinese jurisdiction over the Black Dragon Island
- stage a successful naval invasion of Japan so that their "Divine Wind" can never help them again.
- and 16 other possible direct wars
- as well as new endings and achievements

Have fun playing!
